title: The Life of Mt. Hororyuu: The Forefather of all Life and Magic at 4.6 Billion Years Old - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Historical   Slice of Life   Supernatural
tags: Ancient Times   Artifacts   Calm Protagonist   Demi-Humans   Dragons   Dwarfs   Elves   Evolution   Folklore   Godly Powers   Immortals   Leadership   Magic   Modern Knowledge   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Race Change   Reincarnated as an Object   Time Skip
author: Kurodome Hagane   黒留ハガネ
description: Everyone knows that mountains are stronger than people! Then, it is natural that the strongest mountain is stronger than the strongest human!? This is the story of being reincarnated into a mountain on Earth 4.6 billion years ago, having to overcome giant meteorite impacts and global freezing, watching the rise and fall of the dinosaurs, using a 'mysterious power' to distribute magic to living things and thus create dwarfs, elves, and beastmen, and then reigning as a sacred peak throughout history.>
